description: A list of plants installed (planted) in Hudson River Park, along with the date and location of the installation.  This is part of the ongoing efforts of  the Hudson River Park Trust’s (HRPT) Horticulture staff to care for the thousands of plants throughout the five-mile park area.

name: Hudson River Park Flora - Plantings:  Beginning 1997
